event.name: FOSDEM 2017

location.site: Free University of Brussels, Solbosch Campus

event.description: FOSDEM is an event centered on free and open-source software development. As with many other communities, the BSDs feature an alloted room for giving talks at the event. See schedule on the FOSDEM website for the talks held in the BSD Developer room. The FreeBSD Foundation will also be present to share information about the project.
